com.qualcomm.hardware.ams

Interface AMSColorSensor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AMSColorSensorImpl

    public interface AMSColorSensor
    AMSColorSensor is an extension of ColorSensor interface that provides additional functionality supported by a family of color sensor chips from AMS. Notable uses of chips in this family include the AdaFruit color sensor and the Lynx color sensor.
    See Also:
    AMS Color Sensors

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Gain

      static class  AMSColorSensor.Parameters
      Instances of Parameters contain data indicating how the sensor is to be initialized.
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Register
      REGISTER provides symbolic names for interesting device registers

      byte getDeviceID()

      • initialize

        boolean initialize(AMSColorSensor.Parameters parameters)
        Initialize the sensor using the indicated set of parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters with which to initialize the device
        Returns:
        whether initialization was successful or not
